src:
Turkmanistonda do‘kondan oziq-ovqat xarid qilmoqchi bo‘lganlardan oilaviy ma’lumotnoma talab qilinmoqda

05 Nov 2019, 19:20

Turkmanistonda davlat korxonalarida faoliyat olib borayotgan fuqarolarning oylik maoshlari kechikishda davom etmoqda. Bu haqda “Xronika Turkmenistana” xabar qildi.


Foto: “Kg.utro.net”

Xabarga ko‘ra, Lebob viloyatining Turkmanobod tumanidagi do‘konlarda sotuvchilar xaridorlarga qarzga mahsulot sotishni istamayapti. Iste’molchilar esa maoshlari kechikayotgani tufayli do‘kondagi avvalgi qarzlarini ham to‘lay olmayapti.
Oilalardagi iqtisodiy inqiroz sabab non, un, qand va tuxum arzon bo‘lgan davlat do‘konlarida ushbu mahsulotlarni olish uchun navbatda turishlar ko‘paygan. Ammo avval xabar qilinganidek, aholi ko‘p iste’mol qiladigan ushbu zarur tovarlar hali ham do‘konlarga kam olib kelinmoqda.

Mavzuga doir: 
Turkmanistonliklar mazasi yomon, ko‘ngilni aynituvchi Eron tuxumlarini sotib olishga majbur bo‘lmoqda

Davlat do‘konlarining direktorlari xaridorlar sonini kamaytirish maqsadida maktab o‘quvchilariga mahsulot sotishni taqiqlagan. Ashxobodda sotuvchilar do‘konda navbatda turganlardan har hafta xo‘jalik shirkati tomonidan beriladigan oila tarkibi haqidagi ma’lumotnoma (Forma-3) olib kelishni talab qilmoqda.

Mavzuga doir: 
Turkmanistonning Mari viloyati do‘konlariga un ikki oydan beri yetkazib berilmayapti

“Xo‘jalik shirkatlaridagi barcha ma’lumotnomalar pulli, ularning narxi 2 manatdan 20 manatgacha. Pul yo‘qligi yetmagandek, har hafta ma’lumotnoma sotib olish talab qilinmoqda,” — deydi Kimyogarlar mavzesida yashovchi ayol.
Gagarin mavzesidagi xususiy do‘kon egasi esa xaridorlarning qarzga olgan mahsulotlari va kimning qancha pul berishi kerakligi yozilgan ko‘p varaqli daftarning to‘lib ketgani va savdo uchun ulgurji tarzda mahsulotlar olish uchun pul tushumi yo‘qligini ta’kidlagan.
text:
In Turkmenistan, people who want to buy groceries need a family certificate

05 Nov 2019, 19:20

Salaries of state-owned businesses in Turkmenistan are delayed. About it reports "Chronicle Turkmenistana".


Photo: "kg.utro.net"

Shoppers in the Turkmenbashi district of Lebap province say they do not want to sell their products to customers. Consumers are also unable to pay their previous debt in the store due to delays in their salaries.
Due to the economic downturn in the family, there are more queues in the state grocery stores where cheaper bread, flour, sugar and eggs are available. However, as previously reported, these essential goods, often consumed by the population, are still rarely supplied to stores.

Topic:
The Turkmen are forced to buy eggs that are tasty and frustrating

State store directors have banned schoolchildren from selling products to reduce the number of customers. In Ashgabat, vendors are demanding that they keep a form of the family listing (Form 3) provided by the business weekly in the store.

Topic:
Shops in the Mari region of Turkmenistan have not been delivered for twelve months

“All the information in the economic companies is paid, from 2 to 20 manats. We have to buy a certificate every week, as there is not enough money, ”says a woman who lives in the Chemists area.
The owner of a private shop in Gagarin said that a large sheet of goods was overwritten by buyers and who should pay, and that there was no money for wholesale purchases.
